name: Golf Quest
description:
This game is my entry on Miz Jam 1.

GOLF QUEST is a PUZZLE-GOLF game with tiny elements of RPG. You have an character with params of HORIZONTAL power and VERTICAL power. This is crucial to understand the game flow.

CONTROLS

MOUSE LEFT BUTTON --> Send the ball in the opposite direction (mouse cursor behind the ball to strike it forward);

[R] or [F6] --> Restart the level;

[Esc] --> Pause the game.

ACHIEVEMENTS

GOLF QUEST has achievements to be unlocked! You have 15 goals to complete and beat the game 100%. Try to do that while playing to have much more fun!

MANY CHARACTERS & LEVELS!

SIX different characters and TEN different levels! Try to get them all and play in every level. So, GOOD LUCK AND HAVE FUN!
